content:
Today, the Russian army attacked Kharkiv region again, and it is now known that a local resident was killed.

About thisinformsHead of Kharkiv Ova Oleg Synigubov.

“At about 13 hours, the invaders struck enemy in the city of Vovchansk of the Chuguev district. A 65-year-old civilian died as a result of shelling, ”he said.

According to the head of the Ova, law enforcement officers work on the spot and record regular crimes of the invaders.

As reported by the Armyinform, almost15 settlements of Kharkiv regionThey are fired in a day: where and where they were beaten.
title: As a result of a hostile blow to Vovchansk, a man was killed
description: The head of Kharkiv Ova Oleg Synigubov informs about it. “About 13 hours the occupiers ...
author: Army Inform
